overview: El Eclipse shows the frustration and hopelessness of a family who has lost its father. Located in the south-coast of México during a total sun eclipse, the drama narrates the conflict of a family during an unexpected visit; a man rents a room in the house of the family that is conditioned as a restaurant for the few clients who visit the beach on Sundays.

production_companies.name: Fondo de Inversión y Estímulos al Cine (FIDECINE)

title: The Eclipse
